Package game.grounds.highgrounds.trees

Class Mature

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.positions.Ground
game.grounds.highgrounds.HighGround
game.grounds.highgrounds.trees.Tree
game.grounds.highgrounds.trees.Mature
All Implemented Interfaces:
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.capabilities.Capable, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.displays.Printable, Destroyable, Resettable
public class Mature
extends Tree
A class that represents the mature tree in the Game Map. It is a new class that extends Tree. It has a 15% chance to spawn Koopa or FlyingKoopa in every turn. For every 5 turns, It can grow a new sprout in one of the surrounding fertile squares, randomly. If there is no available fertile square, it will stop growing sprouts. Besides, that, It has 20% to wither and die (becomes Dirt) in every turn.
